en: rearc-native Developer in a game company of Combodia
react-native team-leader in a mobile start-up company
I am assigned to assist team for building automatic work flow. Using Docker, Ansible, Travis CI, AMS, Vagrant..any tool which can help team for accelerating development progress
I am responsible for building back-end service for a app named `Tomato`, The benchmark of the app is IFTTT which can help user to automate their job in the life
It's a app for helping pregnant women. I am responsible for PM of this project, and analysis data by Python and JAVA

I am responsible for building app by Unity game engine, and also for sales, promotion, demo. Because the project is in startup early stage, so complex multi job must to do. The project finally spin-off from my origin company and got one billions of dollars investment from China's company `Alibaba`

The project worked when I was a master, I am responsible for building the communication system in rocket, I used C language and Texas Instruments DSP hardware, the rock band in Taiwan named `Mayday` made a song named `stubborn` for the project
ch: 此App為我用React Native打造的iPad端App，用來幫助協會裁判上桌與記籌碼用
此專案為我在傲勝遊戲公司負責的專案，負責內容為用React Native打造看漫畫App裡的動畫手勢組件
此為我在新創公司，與另一位工程師，兩人合力用React Native打造的交友App
此專案為我在工研院時執行，負責內容為使用Ruby on Rails撰寫App後端的Restful API
此專案為我在工研院時執行，付責使用Python及JAVA進行App回傳的資料分析，並撰寫爬蟲爬取個大論壇孕婦相關資料進行分析
此專案為我在工研院時執行，負責專案的服務設計
此專案為我在交大碩士時執行之專案，負責使用C語言撰寫火箭上通訊系統
